import { useState } from "react"; import { Goal } from "./Goal"; export const Target = () => { const [goals, setGoals] = useState([{ id: "answerList--0", value: "" }]); const removeGoal = (goal) => { const updatedGoals = goals.filter(item => item.id != goal.id); setGoals(updatedGoals) } return (
